law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 296, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 6. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 1. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 376, sec. 6. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Race meetings, when held -- Prize regulations.
